content: Please provide more information about being locked out. Include error messages and any prompts. Thanks.
creator: davidsk

content: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, then restart Mozilla Firefox. Ensure your email account settings are correctly configured and that you're using the latest version of the email client or service. If the issue persists, consider reinstalling Firefox or checking for updates.
creator: Clarke75

content: I nomi ti vengono proposti in auto-completamento solo se sono in rubrica... Per cui basta eliminarli dalla rubrica. Sempre se ho capito bene la tua richiesta...
creator: @next

content: Local folders exist only on the device where stored and are not available on internet. To be visible from another device, the folders would all have to be uploaded to your IMAP account.
creator: davidsk

content: Try with VPN disabled. That may not be your preference, but disabling may at least let you know whether it's a factor.

thanks David, really appreciate your help.

content: First, I have had regular success in the past from Majorgeeks, but since the official version is at thunderbird.net, please use only that URL for Thunderbird releases. If all is working well, there is little incentive except for new features you may wish. If you upgrade, I do encourage doing a backup of profile (with thunderbird not running) prior to the upgrade.
creator: davidsk
